languages.text: "Я помню тот разговор. Однако в данный момент я предпочел бы сосредоточиться на своих обязанностях". {n}Хейнрикс качает головой, в его голосе звенят нотки сожаления.{/n} "Возможно, позже. После Кьявы Гамма".

traits.locale_text: "Я помню тот разговор. Однако в данный момент я предпочел бы сосредоточиться на своих обязанностях". {n}Хейнрикс качает головой, в его голосе звенят нотки сожаления.{/n} "Возможно, позже. После Кьявы Гамма".

languages.text: "I do remember our exchange. For the time being, however, I would prefer to focus on my direct responsibilities." {n}You hear a note of regret in Heinrix's voice as he shakes his head.{/n} "Perhaps, later. After Kiava Gamma."
languages.original_text: "Я помню тот разговор. Однако в данный момент я предпочел бы сосредоточиться на своих обязанностях". {n}Хейнрикс качает головой, в его голосе звенят нотки сожаления.{/n} "Возможно, позже. После Кьявы Гамма".

traits.locale_text: "I remember our exchange. For the time being, however, I would prefer to focus on my responsibilities." {n}You hear a tinge of regret in his voice. Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "Perhaps later. After Kiava Gamma."

"I remember our exchange. For the time being, however, I would prefer to focus on my responsibilities." {n}You hear a tinge of regret in his voice. Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "Perhaps later. After Kiava Gamma."

"I do remember our exchange. For the time being, however, I would prefer to focus on my direct responsibilities." {n}You hear a note of regret in Heinrix's voice as he shakes his head.{/n} "Perhaps, later. After Kiava Gamma."

"I do remember our exchange. For the time being, however, I would prefer to focus on my direct responsibilities." {n}You hear a note of regret in Heinrix's voice as he shakes his head.{/n} "Perhaps, later. After Kiava Gamma."

"I do remember our exchange. For the time being, however, I would prefer to focus on my direct responsibilities." {n}You hear a note of regret in Heinrix's voice as he shakes his head.{/n} "Perhaps, later. After Kiava Gamma."

"I do remember our exchange. For the time being, however, I would prefer to focus on my direct responsibilities." {n}You hear a note of regret in Heinrix's voice as he shakes his head.{/n} "Perhaps, later. After Kiava Gamma."

languages.text: « Je me souviens de notre conversation. Pour l'heure, toutefois, je préférerais que nous nous concentrions sur mes responsabilités directes. » {n}Vous sentez une pointe de regret dans la voix d'Heinrix qui hoche la tête.{/n} « Plus tard, peut-être. Après Kiava Gamma. »
languages.original_text: "I do remember our exchange. For the time being, however, I would prefer to focus on my direct responsibilities." {n}You hear a note of regret in Heinrix's voice as he shakes his head.{/n} "Perhaps, later. After Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: « Je me souviens de notre conversation. Pour l'heure, toutefois, je préférerais que nous nous concentrions sur mes responsabilités directes. » {n}Vous sentez une pointe de regret dans la voix d'Heinrix qui hoche la tête.{/n} « Plus tard, peut-être. Après Kiava Gamma. »

languages.text: “我记得我们之前的约定，不过就目前而言，我更愿意专注于我的职责。”{n}海因里希摇了摇头，你从他的声音中听出一丝遗憾。{/n}“或许以后再说吧，等基亚瓦伽马星的任务结束之后。”
languages.original_text: "I do remember our exchange. For the time being, however, I would prefer to focus on my direct responsibilities." {n}You hear a note of regret in Heinrix's voice as he shakes his head.{/n} "Perhaps, later. After Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: “我记得我们之前的约定，不过就目前而言，我更愿意专注于我的职责。”{n}海因里希摇了摇头，你从他的声音中听出一丝遗憾。{/n}“或许以后再说吧，等基亚瓦伽马星的任务结束之后。”

languages.text: "Ich erinnere mich an unseren Austausch. Vorerst jedoch würde ich es vorziehen, mich auf meine direkten Pflichten zu beschränken." {n}Heinrix schüttelt den Kopf und du hörst einen Anflug von Bedauern in seiner Stimme.{/n} "Vielleicht später. Nach Kiava Gamma."
languages.original_text: "I do remember our exchange. For the time being, however, I would prefer to focus on my direct responsibilities." {n}You hear a note of regret in Heinrix's voice as he shakes his head.{/n} "Perhaps, later. After Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erinnere mich an unseren Austausch. Vorerst jedoch würde ich es vorziehen, mich auf meine direkten Pflichten zu beschränken." {n}Heinrix schüttelt den Kopf und du hörst einen Anflug von Bedauern in seiner Stimme.{/n} "Vielleicht später. Nach Kiava Gamma."

languages.text: «Recuerdo lo que le dije. Pero, de momento, prefiero centrarme en mis responsabilidades». {n}Detectas un atisbo de lamento en la voz de Heinrix a la vez que sacude la cabeza.{/n} «Quizá más adelante. Después de Kiava Gamma».
languages.original_text: "I do remember our exchange. For the time being, however, I would prefer to focus on my direct responsibilities." {n}You hear a note of regret in Heinrix's voice as he shakes his head.{/n} "Perhaps, later. After Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerdo lo que le dije. Pero, de momento, prefiero centrarme en mis responsabilidades». {n}Detectas un atisbo de lamento en la voz de Heinrix a la vez que sacude la cabeza.{/n} «Quizá más adelante. Después de Kiava Gamma».

languages.text: 「そのやりとりは覚えています。しかし、当面は自分に課された責務に集中したい」{n}ハインリックスは頭を振り、その声は残念そうに響く。{/n}「きっと後で実現しますよ。キアヴァ・ガンマの件が終われば」
languages.original_text: "I do remember our exchange. For the time being, however, I would prefer to focus on my direct responsibilities." {n}You hear a note of regret in Heinrix's voice as he shakes his head.{/n} "Perhaps, later. After Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: 「そのやりとりは覚えています。しかし、当面は自分に課された責務に集中したい」{n}ハインリックスは頭を振り、その声は残念そうに響く。{/n}「きっと後で実現しますよ。キアヴァ・ガンマの件が終われば」

languages.text: "O diyaloğumuzu hatırlıyorum hatırlamasına da şimdilik sorumluluklarıma odaklanmayı tercih ederim." {n}Başını sallayan Heinrix'in sesinde hafif bir üzüntü seziyorsun.{/n} "Belki sonra. Kiava Gama işi hallolduğunda."
languages.original_text: "I do remember our exchange. For the time being, however, I would prefer to focus on my direct responsibilities." {n}You hear a note of regret in Heinrix's voice as he shakes his head.{/n} "Perhaps, later. After Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: "O diyaloğumuzu hatırlıyorum ancak şimdilik direkt olarak sorumluluklarıma odaklanmayı tercih edeceğim." {n}Başını sallayan Heinrix'in sesinde hafif bir üzüntü seziyorsun.{/n} "Belki sonra. Kiava Gama'nın ardından."
